Articles.Content:
This is my interplanetary space ship, called the Belteguese. It's main objective is to go around the solar system, map out, and record the topography of the other planets and it's celestial neighbors. It also has the capability to land on non-atmospheric moons/planets with it's landing gear, and has enough room for 2 extra kerbals in the transport tank (the feint light behind the main cabin). And sorry if I took the screenies while on the dark side, my PC can only handle so much graphics. Hope you like it.

Mods used:

B9 Aerospace Pack

Ion Hybrid Engine Pack

PC Electrical parts

MechJeb 2.0.8 (What would I ever do without it?)

Quantum Struts

KW Rocketry (For sending this heavyweight into space)
Post some lighted screenshots, can't see much
As requested. . . I got the lighted screenshots. Sorry for the blur though, I'm using quarter res with fastest rendering.
